articles.title: ‘Playing with fire’: Ukraine’s frustration grows with US lawmakers, Europe - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Ukraine is raising its standing army by 300,000, as the US stumbles and the EU lacks capacity to defend a future member.
articles.content:
Athens, Greece Frustration with the United States for holding back critical financial and military aid from Ukraine spilled into the open at the Delphi Economic Forum in Greece last week.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Europe pledges to boost aid to Sudan on unwelcome war anniversary - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Germany promises $260m as European diplomats meet in Paris to mark the first anniversary of the conflict.
articles.content:
Germany will provide 244 million euros ($260m) in humanitarian aid to Sudan, one year after the country plunged into war, as other European countries are also expected to pledge more funds.
